lead_paragraph: Add Michael Phelps' name to the list of Americans who were less than amused by teammate Ryan Lochte's post-competition, early morning drunken antics at the Rio Olympics.

headline.main: Phelps to Lochte Before Scrape: 'Keep Your Head on Straight'
headline.print_headline: Phelps to Lochte Before Scrape: 'Keep Your Head on Straight'

snippet: Add Michael Phelps' name to the list of Americans who were less than amused by teammate Ryan Lochte's post-competition, early morning drunken antics at the Rio Olympics....
